name: dealanzeiger.ch
tag_list: liveshopping, groupshopping, deindeal, qoqa, daydeal, groupon, aggregator
overview:
Dealanzeiger.ch is a Swiss Liveshopping and Groupshopping overview. The company’s aim is to provide a useful portal that allows visitors to

  • never miss a deal
  • save time by not having to check each’s supplier’s website every day
  • no email overflow, not receiving tons of newsletters every day
  • be notified when a new supplier emerges

The business model is a normal aggregator, but the special approach is that dealanzeiger.ch combines liveshopping and groupshopping.

Currently the following deal-suppliers are supported: Liveshopping - DayDal, QoQa, GetItFast, Conrad, Gudi and QWine Groupshopping - Groupon, DeinDeal, Dailydeal (for about 12 cities)

More suppliers and cities will be added as soon as offerings appear.
